background.comment: Used for the background of secondary ButtonLink in the default state.

background-hover.comment: Used for the background of secondary ButtonLink in the hover state.

background-active.comment: Used for the background of secondary ButtonLink in the active and the focus state.

foreground.comment: Used for the text of secondary ButtonLink in the default state.

foreground-hover.comment: Used for the text of secondary ButtonLink in the hover state.

foreground-active.comment: Used for the text of secondary ButtonLink in the active and the focus state.
